huji.ac.il.stick_defence

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • huji.ac.il.stick_defence.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the game state of stick-defence game. That is contains all sprites, handle them and manage the interactions between them. Singletone.
